amendment.description: To protect the public and investors from abusive affiliate, associate company, and subsidiary company transactions.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1416 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 315.

Amendment SA 1416 proposed by Senator Feingold to Amendment SA 1412. (consideration: CR S10203-10213, S10216; text: CR S10203-10204) To protect the public and investors from abusive affiliate, associate company, and subsidiary company transactions.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1416 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 315.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1416 proposed by Senator Feingold to Amendment SA 1412.
